text: Eryk Tyrek Williamson (born June 11, 1997) is an American soccer player who plays as an Attacking midfielder for Portland Timbers in Major League Soccer. ==Career== Williamson was a member of the D.C. United academy before being traded to the Portland Timbers in January 2018. Williamson was linked with a move to Schalke in early 2018, but Schalke never made an offer. ==Personal== Williamson is the cousin of the singer, actress, and producer, Queen Latifah. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at Maryland * Profile at US Soccer Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Alexandria, Virginia Category:Soccer players from Virginia Category:American soccer players Category:Homegrown Players (MLS) Category:United States men's under-20 international soccer players Category:Maryland Terrapins men's soccer players Category:Portland Timbers players Category:Portland Timbers 2 players Category:C.D. Santa Clara players Category:Major League Soccer players Category:USL Championship players Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Association football midfielders Category:United States men's under-23 international soccer players
title: Eryk Williamson
